long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Corporations can treat you like shit because you’ll eventually forget you were ever mad.

Drop United is a Chrome extension that drags United Airlines off your flight search results. 

So the next time you search for a flight, United won’t have a seat in your options.

Welcome to the United States of Humanity.


***By installing this extension, you are opting in to having United Airlines hidden from your flight search results.
